name: mediafsjs
author: K.Meinert <kevinNOSPAMMMMREMOVETHIS@subatomicglue.com> (https://www.subatomiclabs.com/)
description: File browsing and retrieval subsystem for media player apps built on NodeJS.  Root presents a clean list of bookmarks to user-safe locations only.  Mixing several FS types like DLNA/uPnP, LocalFS with a unified way to navigate them all.  Default bookmarks configurable per app.  Folder list item enrichment using available media [default icon, folder icon, embedded icon for supported file types, audio file playtime].  Folder sorting.
